SELECT CASE MILEAGE_UNIT WHEN 'A' THEN CONCAT(ABS(MILEAGE_AMOUNT), 'P(￦)') ELSE CONCAT(ABS(MILEAGE_AMOUNT), 'P($)') END AS AMOUNT FROM T_MILEAGE WHERE REQUEST_FORM_NO = #{mileageNo}
SELECT MILEAGE_CN FROM T_MILEAGE WHERE MILEAGE_NO = #{mileageNo}

SELECT A.REQUEST_FORM_SJ, B.MEMBER_HP AS REQUEST_HP, A.REQUEST_FORM_NO, C.MEMBER_HP AS DESIGNER_HP, A.REQUEST_FORM_SE, B.MEMBER_TP, (SELECT MEMBER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO AND MEMBER_SE = 'A') AS REQUEST_NICK_NAME, (SELECT MEMBER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND MEMBER_SE = 'C') AS DESIGNER_NICK_NAME, A.REGISTER_NO, A.REQUEST_DESIGNER_NO AS DESIGNER_NO, (SELECT CASE MILEAGE_UNIT WHEN 'A' THEN CONCAT(ABS(SUM(MILEAGE_AMOUNT)), 'P(￦)') ELSE CONCAT(ABS(SUM(MILEAGE_AMOUNT)), 'P($)') END AS AMOUNT FROM T_MILEAGE WHERE REQUEST_FORM_NO = A.REQUEST_FORM_NO) AS AMOUNT, B.MEMBER_EMAIL AS REQUEST_EMAIL FROM T_REQUEST_FORM A LEFT JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.REGISTER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO AND B.DELETED_AT = 'N' LEFT JOIN T_MEMBER C ON A.REQUEST_DESIGNER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND C.DELETED_AT = 'N' WHERE A.DELETED_AT = 'N' AND A.REQUEST_FORM_NO = #{requestFormNo}

SELECT A.REQUEST_FORM_SJ, B.MEMBER_HP AS REQUEST_HP, B.MEMBER_EMAIL AS REQUEST_EMAIL, (SELECT MEMBER_HP FROM T_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{registerNo} AND DELETED_AT = 'N') AS DESIGNER_HP, (SELECT MEMBER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO AND MEMBER_SE = 'A') AS REQUEST_NICK_NAME, (SELECT MEMBER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{registerNo} AND MEMBER_SE = 'C') AS DESIGNER_NICK_NAME, A.REGISTER_NO, A.REQUEST_DESIGNER_NO AS DESIGNER_NO FROM T_REQUEST_FORM A LEFT JOIN T_MEMBER B ON A.REGISTER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO AND B.DELETED_AT = 'N' WHERE A.DELETED_AT = 'N' AND A.REQUEST_FORM_NO = #{requestFormNo}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_MEMBER WHERE DELETED_AT = 'N') AS MEMBER_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*)+1060 FROM T_REQUEST_FORM WHERE DELETED_AT = 'N') AS REQUEST_CNT, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(ABS(MILEAGE_AMOUNT)) FROM T_MILEAGE tm WHERE tm.MILEAGE_SE ='B' AND MILEAGE_UNIT = 'A' AND REQUEST_FORM_NO IN(SELECT REQUEST_FORM_NO FROM T_REQUEST_FORM WHERE DELETED_AT = 'N' AND REQUEST_STATUS = 'D')), 0) +17312349 AS WON_TOTAL_PRICE, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(ABS(MILEAGE_AMOUNT)) FROM T_MILEAGE tm WHERE tm.MILEAGE_SE ='B' AND MILEAGE_UNIT = 'B' AND REQUEST_FORM_NO IN(SELECT REQUEST_FORM_NO FROM T_REQUEST_FORM WHERE DELETED_AT = 'N' AND REQUEST_STATUS = 'D')), 0) + 7645.25 AS DOLLAR_TOTAL_PRICE

SELECT A.MEMBER_HP AS DESIGNER_HP, (SELECT MEMBER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER_PROFILE WHERE MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO AND MEMBER_SE = 'C') AS DESIGNER_NICK_NAME FROM T_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELETED_AT = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
